alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 10:23PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Weakening thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Otero, northwestern Prowers, southwestern Kiowa and Bent Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 1021 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking weakening thunderstorms along a line extending from near Haswell to near John Martin Reservoir to 12 miles northeast of Higbee. Movement was east at 40 mph. These thunderstorms are producing strong winds as they collapse and weaken. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Las Animas, Eads, Wiley, Neeoshe Reservoir, McClave, Blue Lake, Sweetwater Reservoir, Hasty, Neegronda Reservoir, Arlington, John Martin Reservoir, Caddoa and Fort Lyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
